      Useful when the result will not be assigned.

      IPoint2f.IMutablePoint2f getOrigin(IPoint2f.IMutablePoint2f result)
      The origin of an entity is the point which added to the raw coordinates, designates the center of the entity and it's world coordinates.

      float getOriginY()

      • getBoundsBack

        IRectangle2f getBoundsBack()
        Useful when the result will not be assigned.

        Caution: The result may be modified over time.
        Preferable use of #getBounds(IMutableRectangle2f) is recommended.
        Returns:
        The backing object for the entity bounds.
